channel.title: Do By Friday: Episode 79, Featuring Drafts
channel.description:
*Do by Friday* is a podcast hosted by Merlin Mann, Max Temkin and Alex Cox. They do a weekly challenge, and this week the challenge was to do cool things with Drafts.
They invited me on to discuss the app. It's a fun podcast. Be warned, it's decidedly not safe for work. Drafts discussion starts around the 46 minute mark:
**[Do by Friday, #79](http://dobyfriday.com/79)**
The bonus episode featuring @nahumck teaching Max about Drafts is also available:
**[Do by Friday: Tim Nahumck Teaches Max How to Use Drafts](https://www.patreon.com/posts/tim-nahumck-max-18877088)**
